#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
    ll t,x1,y1,x2,y2,x,y;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
        x=abs(x1-x2);
        y=abs(y1-y2);
        cout<<gcd(x,y)-1<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
